Name: Bamboo (with triple sec)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: For sophisticated dry palates - a touch of triple sec takes the dry edge off of fino sherry and dry vermouth.
Nutrition: One serving of Bamboo (with triple sec) contains 108 calories
